attributes.action: Breconsider – 2nd EU referendum to approve the new relationship with Europe
attributes.additional_details: This proposal will enable the people to make a final decision on the UK's membership of the EU with clarity on the alternative and the implications for all the nations of the UK
attributes.background: We call on the Government not to invoke Article 50 and start the formal exit process from the EU until a provisional framework for the UK's new relationship with our European partners has been agreed by Parliament and that framework has been endorsed by the British people in a second referendum.
